definitions.definition: One who conducts or leads; a guide ; a director .
A person who conducts an orchestra , choir or other music ensemble ; a professional whose occupation is conducting.
A person who takes tickets on public transportation and also helps passengers .
Something that can transmit electricity , heat , light , or sound .
An ideal of a ring that measures how far it is from being integrally closed
A grooved sound or staff used for directing instruments, such as lithontriptic forceps ; a director .

main_definition: One who conducts or leads; a guide ; a director .
secondary_definitions: ( music ) A person who conducts an orchestra , choir or other music ensemble ; a professional whose occupation is conducting.
( rail transport ) A person who takes tickets on public transportation and also helps passengers .
( physics ) Something that can transmit electricity , heat , light , or sound .
( mathematics ) An ideal of a ring that measures how far it is from being integrally closed
A grooved sound or staff used for directing instruments, such as lithontriptic forceps ; a director .
